# OnlinerBase.ValueChangeDelegate delegate

Provides delegate for detection of a change of tag value.

```csharp
public delegate void ValueChangeDelegate(ITwinPrimitive twinPrimitive, object original, 
    object newValue);
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| twinPrimitive | Tag on which the value change occurred. |
| original | Original value. |
| newValue | Changed value. |
